è‹±æ–‡ç‰ˆ:
Color Portals relies on only physical items in the game, (wool, pressure plates, buttons, and signs), to create portals. Also, you do not need to run back and forth between portals setting locations as Color Portals does this automatically. And above all, there are no commands necessary so you don't have to take time away from building to type things!
